ref.markings:
- Recto, bottom, brown pen:
'Hoc opus, est hominis: || Sed opus fuit omne JEHOVAE! || mundus enim nunquam, || Protulit, Huic similem. / D. Pfeil.f."
- Below:
"[...]C: i6[?] [...]3."
[KKL 2020, see slightly different reading in Exhib. Cat. Detroit et al. 1983, 234 and Knöll, Leyde, Overdick 2020, No. 54]
